sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Set update CI status from RITM property to false for zboot.</description> <name>Set update CI status from RITM property</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[function updateProperty() { if (GlidePluginManager.isZboot()) { gs.setProperty('glide.itam_update_ci_status_from_ritm', 'false'); } } updateProperty();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-05-09 07:26:18</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a371ac0093b221109b7bbfa86cba1083</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set update CI status from RITM property</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Product Catalog" source="com.snc.product_catalog">4118f8ec3cb1311068bcf327dfe37fd0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a371ac0093b221109b7bbfa86cba1083</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-09 07:26:18</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set update CI status from RITM property
